ComicInfo.Summary: Rick and Morty Heart of Rickness Book One: Summer fouls-up a transaction between Rick and Kordo (an alien gangster) forcing her, Rick, and Morty to barely escape with their lives. However, Kordo's men planted a bomb abord Rick's spaceship, forcing them to crash on a primitive planet that has renounced all technology and is led by Savage Rick. The two Ricks have an ego-clash, resulting in "our trio" being thrown into a pit of zombies. Meanwhile, Beth and Jerry use Rick's spare portal gun to search for their wayward family members, ending up at an alien luxury resort where they have the time of their lives. Rick vows war on Savage Rick.
